Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: SOCCER - FIFA BOSS HAVELANGE STANDS BY WEAH .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| FIFA |
| SOCCER |
| FIFA BOSS (implies FIFA, but for clarity, we keep it separate) |
| Havelange (assumed to be a person with the organizational title "FIFA BOSS") |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| SOCCER (assumed to be a sport or league, but to err on the side of caution, we leave it here) |

Note: Since "Havelange" is a person mentioned in the context of being the boss of FIFA, we assume "FIFA BOSS" is an organizational title and include both "Havelange" and "FIFA BOSS" as separate entities. However, if it is clear from the context that "Havelange" is being used interchangeably with "FIFA BOSS," then "Havelange" could be removed and only "FIFA" and "FIFA BOSS" would be included.
